      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">

  <div class="node node-editorial-template-1 clearfix">
        
    <div class="zone zone-hero clearfix">
            <div class="region region-hero">
              <figure class="hero-wrap">
                <div class="hero-bg" data-src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/full_media/public/content/story/hero-image/LOL_CMS_034_Article_01.jpg?itok=XChRNJL5">
              </figure>
              <header class="hero-header">
                <h1 class="page-title">On League's Business Model</h1>
              </header>
            </div><!-- END .region-hero -->
          </div><!-- END .zone-hero -->
    <div class="article region region-content">

      <div class="entry-details clearfix">
        <div class="date">
          <time class="pubdate updated"><span class="date-display-single" property="dc:date" datatype="xsd:dateTime" content="2017-01-25T00:00:00-08:00">January 25th, 2017</span></time>
        </div>
                  <div class="credits"><span class="label">Author: </span>Areeb &quot;Bubobubo&quot; Pirani</div>
                      </div><!-- END .entry-details -->

      <div class="node-article">
        <div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <p>Picking a business model for <em>League </em>was tricky. Many of the games we loved came in boxes that we&rsquo;d buy up front, install, and then play through to the credits. After that, we&rsquo;d sit waiting for either an expansion or the next year&rsquo;s updated version (especially for sports games and big franchises). This didn&rsquo;t feel like the right model for <em>League</em> because there wasn&rsquo;t a final boss to beat or a story to complete. We wanted an experience that improved and grew every few weeks as opposed to dropping a big release once a year (or a completely new version every two). We also wanted to invest in ongoing services like hosted servers and matchmaking &mdash; stuff that improved the game under the surface, but wouldn&rsquo;t fit on the back of a sequel box.</p>
<p>Boxes weren&rsquo;t the only thing in the world, of course; there were also Facebook/mobile games running off microtransactions, MMOs that relied on subscriptions, and other industries (like music and movies) developing their own unique models. Working through the pros and cons of each option, we decided to launch our version of a free-to-play game with optional purchases. There was a box too, but you didn&rsquo;t have to buy it.&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<center>
	<img align:="center;" alt="" src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png" style="width: 389px; height: 500px;" /></center>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text-2 field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <p><em>League </em>has changed a lot since launch, but the guiding principles that led us to the initial business model decision are still the same. We wanted to share these core values with you because they underpin our choices today &mdash; and the direction of changes ahead.</p>
<h3>
	VALUE #1: WE CARE ABOUT MAKING A GREAT GAME, ABOVE ALL ELSE.</h3>
<p>There are a lot of things that go into this, like our <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dev-blog-design-values-league-legends" target="_blank">design values for <em>League of Legends</em></a>, our commitment <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/making-the-ultimate-lux-login/" target="_blank">to raising the bar on skins</a>, champions, and <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/11/dev-on-the-champion-rework-pipeline/" target="_blank">champion updates</a>, or the new features we regularly add for all players, regardless of spend. Mastery, competition, and expression are core values to us, and we take your trust (and satisfaction) in these areas very seriously. Revenue is <strong>one </strong>of the things we care about, but it&rsquo;s not the only thing or the most important. Making money enables us to build servers, pay salaries, grow esports, improve <em>League</em>, develop new titles, and more, but <strong>making a great game is our primary win condition</strong>.</p>
<h3>
	VALUE #2: YOU CAN BE THE BEST PLAYER IN THE WORLD WITHOUT SPENDING ANYTHING ON THE GAME.</h3>
<p>The core engine of<em> League of Legends</em> is competition and mastery. Spending money doesn&rsquo;t give either team an advantage going into or during the game. This is sacred to us &mdash; winning and climbing the ladder should be about getting better, not about spending more.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="article-section full-width-image-field-wrapper"><img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/story_full_width_image_field/public/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg?itok=K3WDmlcI" /></div><div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text-3 field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <p>Also, it should be <strong>practical </strong>to be the best player in the world without spending, not just &ldquo;theoretically possible.&rdquo; We&rsquo;ve all played games where spending is the only realistic way to stay competitive, even if you could eventually unlock everything you need. This isn&rsquo;t what we want for <em>League</em>. Champions and runes are the obvious question here &mdash; we believe they aren&rsquo;t pay-to-win because you can be effective with a basic, earnable set. Skill matters much more than your champion pool, and our bi-weekly patches are our commitment to keeping the game balanced. Runes have been a tougher challenge for us, <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/ask-riot-runes-splash-art-and-buttons">as Ghostcrawler mentioned in Ask Riot</a>, and it&rsquo;s why we reduced all Tier 1 and 2 runes down to 1 IP as we think about how we can stay even closer to this value.</p>
<p>You should never feel like buying more stuff is the only way to stay competitive in <em>League</em>.</p>
<h3>
	VALUE #3: YOU SPEND BECAUSE YOU WANT TO, NOT BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO.</h3>
<p>Constantly reminding, cajoling and tricking players into spending money might work in the short term, but it&rsquo;s a lousy experience that destroys trust. We are passionate about doing better; our focus is on optional extras that are so kick-ass (we hope) you&rsquo;ll want to buy them, time after time. Whether it be the skin that makes you love your main even more, the icon that expresses your dedication to your team, or the gift thanking your teammate for the carry, we want to add content that excites you when you first hear about it, feels good when you buy it, <strong>and leaves you glad when you look back</strong>, even months later. This approach lets each purchase make the game better for you while funding future improvements, without trading one for the other.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="article-section full-width-image-field-wrapper"><img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/story_full_width_image_field/public/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg?itok=fFJZSnYS" /></div><div class="article-section"><div class="field field-name-field-full-text-4 field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"> <h3>
	VALUE #4: WE WILL KEEP EVOLVING AND IMPROVING.</h3>
<p>With our values in mind, we will keep trying to make <em>League of Legends</em> more compelling and engaging. Players and Rioters are in this together &mdash; finding awesome new additions, fixing the broken parts, and improving things that work but could be even better. We are bound to make mistakes along the way, like we did when first launching Chromas or getting rid of solo queue. But by listening to players, revisiting our choices, and iterating, we can keep improving <em>League </em>for years to come.</p>
<p class="rtecenter">&mdash;</p>
<p>Now that you know the core of our approach to revenue, we can have better conversations about specific decisions from the past and the ones going forward. Thanks for taking the time to read this and for supporting us.</p>
<p>Join the conversation <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/01/dev-on-leagues-business-model/" target="_blank">over on The Nexus</a>.</p>
 </div></div></div></div>

      </div><!-- END .node-article -->
    </div><!-- END .region.region-content -->
  </div>

    </div>
  </div>

                            <div class="title end">
                                <div class="inner">
                                    <h1 class="text">/dev: On League’s Business Model</h1>

                                    <p class="excerpt end">How does Riot think about making money?</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 1920px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_01.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_01.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080},{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:389,&quot;height&quot;:500},{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080},{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:2400,&quot;height&quot;:1416}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 56.25%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/LOL_CMS_034_Article_01.jpg"
                        alt=""
                    />
                </button>

                                <div class="border"></div>
                            </div>
        </div>

        
                    <div class="action">
                <button type="button" class="action-open-slideshow">
                    <span class="text">View All 4 Images</span>
                </button>
            </div>
            
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>Picking a business model for League was tricky. Many of the games we loved came in boxes that we’d buy up front, install, and then play through to the credits. After that, we’d sit waiting for either an expansion or the next year’s updated version (especially for sports games and big franchises). This didn’t feel like the right model for League because there wasn’t a final boss to beat or a story to complete. We wanted an experience that improved and grew every few weeks as opposed to dropping a big release once a year (or a completely new version every two). We also wanted to invest in ongoing services like hosted servers and matchmaking &#8212; stuff that improved the game under the surface, but wouldn’t fit on the back of a sequel box.</p>
<p>Boxes weren’t the only thing in the world, of course; there were also Facebook/mobile games running off microtransactions, MMOs that relied on subscriptions, and other industries (like music and movies) developing their own unique models. Working through the pros and cons of each option, we decided to launch our version of a free-to-play game with optional purchases. There was a box too, but you didn’t have to buy it. </p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                               
                    
    

                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 389px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:389,&quot;height&quot;:500}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 128.535%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/LOL_CMS_034_Article_02.png"
                        alt=""
                    />
                </button>

                            </div>
        </div>

        
            
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>League has changed a lot since launch, but the guiding principles that led us to the initial business model decision are still the same. We wanted to share these core values with you because they underpin our choices today &#8212; and the direction of changes ahead.</p>
<h3><strong>Value #1: We care about making a great game, above all else.</strong></h3>
<p>There are a lot of things that go into this, like our <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dev-blog-design-values-league-legends" target="_blank">design values for League of Legends</a>, our commitment <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/making-the-ultimate-lux-login/" target="_blank">to raising the bar on skins</a>, champions, and <a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/11/dev-on-the-champion-rework-pipeline/" target="_blank">champion updates</a>, or the new features we regularly add for all players, regardless of spend. Mastery, competition, and expression are core values to us, and we take your trust (and satisfaction) in these areas very seriously. Revenue is<strong> one</strong> of the things we care about, but it’s not the only thing or the most important. Making money enables us to build servers, pay salaries, grow esports, improve League, develop new titles, and more, but <strong>making a great game is our primary win condition</strong>.</p>
<h3><strong>Value #2: You can be the <em>best</em> player in the world without spending anything on the game.</strong></h3>
<p>The core engine of League of Legends is competition and mastery. Spending money doesn’t give either team an advantage going into or during the game. This is sacred to us &#8212; winning and climbing the ladder should be about getting better, not about spending more.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                               
                    
    

                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 1920px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 56.25%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/LOL_CMS_034_Article_03.jpg"
                        alt=""
                    />
                </button>

                            </div>
        </div>

        
            
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>Also, it should be <strong>practical</strong> to be the best player in the world without spending, not just “theoretically possible.” We’ve all played games where spending is the only realistic way to stay competitive, even if you could eventually unlock everything you need. This isn’t what we want for League. Champions and runes are the obvious question here &#8212; we believe they aren’t pay-to-win because you can be effective with a basic, earnable set. Skill matters much more than your champion pool, and our bi-weekly patches are our commitment to keeping the game balanced. Runes have been a tougher challenge for us, <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/ask-riot-runes-splash-art-and-buttons" target="_blank">as Ghostcrawler mentioned in Ask Riot</a>, and it’s why we reduced all Tier 1 and 2 runes down to 1 IP as we think about how we can stay even closer to this value.</p>
<p>You should never feel like buying more stuff is the only way to stay competitive in League.</p>
<h3><strong>Value #3: You spend because you want to, not because you have to.</strong></h3>
<p>Constantly reminding, cajoling and tricking players into spending money might work in the short term, but it’s a lousy experience that destroys trust. We are passionate about doing better; our focus is on optional extras that are so kick-ass (we hope) you’ll <em>want</em> to buy them, time after time. Whether it be the skin that makes you love your main even more, the icon that expresses your dedication to your team, or the gift thanking your teammate for the carry, we want to add content that excites you when you first hear about it, feels good when you buy it, <strong>and leaves you glad when you look back</strong>, even months later. This approach lets each purchase make the game better for you while funding future improvements, without trading one for the other.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                               
                    
    

                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 2400px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/01\/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:2400,&quot;height&quot;:1416}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 59%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/LOL_CMS_034_Article_04.jpg"
                        alt=""
                    />
                </button>

                            </div>
        </div>

        
            
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <h3><strong>Value #4: We will keep evolving and improving.</strong></h3>
<p>With our values in mind, we will keep trying to make League of Legends more compelling and engaging. Players and Rioters are in this together &#8212; finding awesome new additions, fixing the broken parts, and improving things that work but could be even better. We are bound to make mistakes along the way, like we did when first launching Chromas or getting rid of solo queue. But by listening to players, revisiting our choices, and iterating, we can keep improving League for years to come.</p>
<p>&#8212;</p>
<p>Now that you know the core of our approach to revenue, we can have better conversations about specific decisions from the past and the ones going forward. Thanks for taking the time to read this and for supporting us.</p>

    
    </div>


            
            
    </div>



                
                    
                        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-sections"
            >

              <li><a title="" class="" href="http://www.lolesports.com/en_US">Esports Pro Site</a></li>
          </ul>

    <script>
        (function() {
                        var match = document.cookie.match('PVPNET_REGION=(.+?)(;|$)');
            var region = (match) ? match[1] : 'na';

                        match = document.cookie.match('PVPNET_LANG=(.+?)(;|$)');
            var lang = (match) ? match[1] : 'en_US';

            var regionToLanguageMap = {
                na: ['en_US'],
                euw: ['en_GB', 'de_DE', 'es_ES', 'fr_FR', 'it_IT'],
                eune: ['en_PL', 'pl_PL', 'el_GR', 'ro_RO', 'hu_HU', 'cs_CZ'],
                lan: ['es_MX'],
                las: ['es_AR'],
                br: ['pt_BR'],
                jp: ['ja_JP'],
                ru: ['ru_RU'],
                tr: ['tr_TR'],
                oce: ['en_AU'],
                kr: ['ko_KR'],
                pbe: ['en_BE']
            };

                        var regionLangs = regionToLanguageMap[region];
            if (regionLangs && regionLangs.indexOf(lang) < 0) {
                                lang = regionLangs[0];
            }

            var riotbarSrc = '//lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/riotbar/prod/latest/' + lang + '.js';

                        window.rg_force_language = lang;
            window.rg_force_manifest = '//ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/realms/' + region + '.js';

                        window.apolloCfg = {
                services: {
                    comment: {
                        uri: 'http:\/\/apollo.leagueoflegends.com\/apollo\/'
                    }
                }
            };

            var runNexus = function() {
                require(['nexus'], function(nexus) {
                    nexus();
                });
            }

                        require([riotbarSrc], runNexus, runNexus);
        })();
    </script>

  </div>
</div>  </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div></header>

      <div class="view-content">

      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">      <h3>Application</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1479" class="faq-link">Is there any way to apply for a team that doesn’t have a position listed?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1436" class="faq-link">Why are the internship job descriptions and requirements so ambiguous?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1437" class="faq-link">I don&#039;t meet all the requirements, should I still apply?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1482" class="faq-link">How can I make my application stand out?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1483" class="faq-link">I know how to do a lot of things, which position should I apply for?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1484" class="faq-link">To whom should I address my cover letter?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1485" class="faq-link">How long should my cover letter and resume be?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1486" class="faq-link">Can I submit extra materials?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1487" class="faq-link"> Do I have to write my cover letter? Or can it be in whatever form I dream of?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1488" class="faq-link">Should I include letters of recommendation or references?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-11 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1489" class="faq-link">Can you give me feedback on my application materials?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-12 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1490" class="faq-link">Should I send in a hard copy of my application?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd views-row-last">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1491" class="faq-link">I’m having technical issues with the application portal, who can help me?</a></div>  </div></li>
      </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Timeline</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1439" class="faq-link">BAM! I just applied, now what?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1440" class="faq-link">Can I update my application with new stuff or correct an error?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1495" class="faq-link">Is there anyone I can follow up with to check my application status or reiterate my interest?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even views-row-last">

</div><div class="block block-views block-d4ade4b8e831a5e72199c2ad5573d017 block-views-d4ade4b8e831a5e72199c2ad5573d017 odd block-without-title" id="block-views-d4ade4b8e831a5e72199c2ad5573d017">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-faq-page-questions-answers view-id-faq_page_questions_answers view-display-id-block intern-faq-questions-answers view-dom-id-ee8bcd415bcb8485cd4442129032ec09">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1430"><h4>Can I still intern if I&#039;m taking some time off or if I&#039;m in my final year of school?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d703-e822-703d-f3fbc596ba09">To qualify for an internship, you&#39;ve gotta be a full-time student in an accredited undergrad, Masters, MBA, PhD, or JD program and remain a full-time student the semester after the internship. We give heavy preference to students looking for internships for the summer before their final year of schooling. Those who&#39;ve graduated already or are graduating soon should check out our full-time openings on the <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers" target="_blank">Careers page.</a></span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1429"><h4>Does my citizenship matter?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d706-f66d-e30b-ba3158a584b1">No, but you&#39;ve gotta be eligible to work in the US. If you already have work authorization that makes you eligible, you&#39;re good. Unfortunately, Riot cannot guarantee work authorization assistance for intern-hopefuls.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1431"><h4>Am I old enough to apply?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d707-c8f4-c73d-2b53e4867a88">Interns must be old enough to legally work where the Riot office is located. While Rioters like to challenge convention, we don&#39;t want to challenge child labor laws! For internships in Los Angeles and St. Louis, this means you have to be at least 18.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1459"><h4>Which classes or majors will help me get an internship?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d70b-5e5b-4106-539e8133c70a">All of them. We don&rsquo;t specify which majors are a perfect match because awesome people come from the most unexpected places. We&rsquo;ve got people in marketing who come from engineering backgrounds, and people in engineering who come from liberal arts backgrounds. That said, some teams may require specific skills. Where possible, we&rsquo;ve spelled out those requirements in the job description. If you&rsquo;re thinking a few years ahead, check out the</span><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers" target="_blank"> Careers</a> page for info on the specific skills that we value in full-time Rioters.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1460"><h4>Oh noes! I have absolutely zero work experience, what do I do?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d70c-6361-c083-988805ef66a1">You don&rsquo;t need to get paid for doing something to count it as experience. Class projects, volunteer work, independent projects, and other activities (attending conferences, workshops, hackathons, and game jams) rack up experience points that enhance your capabilities and value. Riot highly prizes autodidacts, so show us what you&rsquo;ve learned.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1461"><h4>I’m good at League of Legends. Will that help?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d70d-bd6f-ebcb-cea849fd0e49">Of course we hope that you&rsquo;re familiar enough with </span><em>League of Legends </em>to jump into a game with us. Can you imagine interviewing for a job at Apple without having ever tried an iPhone or a Mac? Playing League is just table stakes. We hired a couple Diamond-level players as interns previously, but they also brought a lot of cool things to the table on top of their stellar play. On the flip side, you don&#39;t need to be a pro <em>League of Legends</em> player either. While every Rioter plays <em>League of Legends</em>, not all of us are gonna hit Plat&mdash;and that&rsquo;s okay!</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1433"><h4>Can I intern during the spring or fall semester?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p>All of our internships happen in the summer. We&#39;ve set up our intern program this way so that interns are all here at the same time. This togetherness fosters a tight-knit group experience and helps interns from varying disciplines learn from one another. Synchronizing internships also makes it easier to plan more fun group activities and play more custom 5v5 ARAMs!</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1434"><h4>If my school requires me to complete &quot;extra requirements.&quot; such as a thesis, in order to intern, am I still eligible?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d712-ac04-2e85-2483018f16d0">If you&#39;re an impressive applicant with lots of things to offer, then &quot;extra requirements&quot; won&#39;t stop us from hiring you. Our only concern would be the workload. Would you have enough time and effort to work for Riot? We don&#39;t want you to come out of the internship with bags under your eyes and gray hairs. Give us a heads-up in your cover letter and we&#39;ll figure it out together.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1470"><h4>How many interns are you looking for?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d714-449a-897f-f5eff52c85bd">We don&rsquo;t have an exact number. It could be as little as two or as many as 100. Each year, our internship class grows. Last year, we chose 46 amazing interns from over 6,000 applicants.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1471"><h4>How many intern spots are there on each team?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d716-1b13-7280-78fcf503c843">The number depends on the team, based on their needs. Some decide after they&rsquo;ve reviewed applications.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-11 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1472"><h4>Can I work from home?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d716-c8ca-7139-3d88d5bf9640">You&rsquo;re only here for a brief period, and we want you to get thick into the action, which means being in-house for fist-bumps and to collaborate tightly. So, there&rsquo;s no working from home.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-12 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1473"><h4>How will I pay for housing and transportation?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d717-863e-6761-266386acfbe6">Riot provides furnished housing for all interns near the office. We also offer a travel stipend to get you to the office and back home once the internship&#39;s done.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1474"><h4>When will I start my internship and how long is it?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> Because academic calendars vary from school to school, there will be multiple start dates; May 30 and June 13, and June 27. &nbsp;Internships last 10-12 weeks from your start date. Longer internships are possible, but shorter ones aren&#39;t because you&rsquo;ll need that time to get up to speed and contribute in a major way.
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-14 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1475"><h4>Can I intern for more than 10-12 weeks?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-854e-81d3-e96e-e3ced9b42368">Generally, no. Some summer interns have continued working during the school year, but it&rsquo;s rare.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-15 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1476"><h4>How many hours will I work per week?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d719-d853-fe0c-2e6595d34a55">Our general office hours are from 10 to 7. Interns should expect to work those hours and participate in a lot of fun extras outside of work, too. It&rsquo;s a full time gig.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-16 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1477"><h4>Could an internship turn into an actual job?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8550-2633-ccec-537b80f7be3b">Yes, one of the reasons we have an internship program is to identify (and hire) top talent who&rsquo;ll be graduating soon.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-17 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1478"><h4>I have a few more questions, where can I learn more?  </h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8551-1d56-e2ca-bbf3b6db4e72">Venture over to our</span><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/3544410/3544410-6179696359273160707" target="_blank"> LinkedIn internship thread</a>&nbsp;and we&#39;ll try to answer your questions there.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-18 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1479"><h4>Is there any way to apply for a team that doesn’t have a position listed?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8553-0a0e-1d3d-d757bbc11de6">Sorry, we&#39;ve only got spots open for those teams that are listed.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-19 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1436"><h4>Why are the internship job descriptions and requirements so ambiguous?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p>We&#39;re only guessing what an intern might do nine months from now &ndash; Riot moves pretty quickly. We&#39;re looking for broadly-capable interns who can handle whatever comes their way next summer.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-20 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1437"><h4>I don&#039;t meet all the requirements, should I still apply?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71d-7d64-a9fb-9d8671825713">Maybe. Each team crafts their own job descriptions, so most of the requirements listed are pretty important, but what you&#39;re missing might not be essential. Or the person who&#39;s hiring could give you a thumbs-up if you bring spades of experience or skill in something else.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-21 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1482"><h4>How can I make my application stand out?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">There are lots of ways to stand out! We&#39;re looking for smart, talented students who carve their own tracks. The best way to show us you have what it takes is to accomplish something extraordinary: create a game or a mod, or craft a strong portfolio that demonstrates your aptitude. If you can get a &ldquo;WOW!&rdquo; or a fist-bump from your buddies, then chances are it&rsquo;s pretty incredible.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Here are just a few examples of stuff former Riot NA interns did prior to applying:</span></p>
<ul>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Created high-value content on a well-known blog (or created a well-known blog)</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Started a software development company and shipped a product</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Created artwork that blew minds and won competitions</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Demonstrated mastery of critical technologies we use (e.g., Hadoop, Drupal, Scaleform and Adobe Air) by shipping products using those technologies</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Led esports teams to victory in major </span><em>League of Legends</em> tournaments</p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Self-published a novel or three&nbsp;</span></li>
</ul>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-22 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1483"><h4>I know how to do a lot of things, which position should I apply for?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71f-5a88-fe63-8c3df83632db">We love awesome and talented people who&rsquo;re good at lots of things! Do some digging to figure out where your skills intersect with your passions and see which internship fits you best. Don&rsquo;t apply for all of them! If you&rsquo;ve got a burning passion for a few teams, then give each one a shot. Come up with specific, compelling pitches for each, and let us know why you&rsquo;re the perfect fit for them. Keep in mind that applying for more positions won&rsquo;t increase your chances and spamming could hurt you.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-23 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1484"><h4>To whom should I address my cover letter?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-855f-cf52-ac29-6fdc30965c15">&ldquo;Dear Riot&rdquo; or &ldquo;Dear Rioters&rdquo; works!</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-24 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1485"><h4>How long should my cover letter and resume be?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d720-4d2b-a6a8-608a68652508">We don&rsquo;t have a hard cutoff but check with your school&rsquo;s career services office for generally accepted practices.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-25 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1486"><h4>Can I submit extra materials?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8580-e228-3501-41dfe8dd460a">Sure! Most positions require only a cover letter and resume, so anything extra is up to you as long as you can submit it electronically with your application. Use your best judgment; a link to a 10-minute monologue video is probably too much.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-26 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1487"><h4> Do I have to write my cover letter? Or can it be in whatever form I dream of?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d721-8640-23a4-2445017d746e">Feel free to be creative and flex your odd and extraordinary skills. As long as you can submit it via the app portal or we can access it online, you&rsquo;re good to go. Just keep in mind that a well-executed application is always better than a mediocre creative experiment.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-27 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1488"><h4>Should I include letters of recommendation or references?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8582-9340-222e-e195dfd5fc85">They won&rsquo;t come into play until later in the interview process, so stash them somewhere safe for now.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-28 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1489"><h4>Can you give me feedback on my application materials?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d722-ba2f-3bdf-83116007c69d">Unfortunately, we can&rsquo;t. The volume of applications is such that we&rsquo;d need a dedicated feedback team to provide comments on every application. There are resources and people in our</span><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/3544410/3544410-6179696359273160707" target="_blank"> LinkedIn community</a> who may be willing to give feedback, though.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-29 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1490"><h4>Should I send in a hard copy of my application?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d723-f0a7-9f24-f52dd8d31dd9">Save a sapling and stick to using our website when submitting your materials.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-30 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1491"><h4>I’m having technical issues with the application portal, who can help me?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8584-ad5d-1e42-b201c1c1d0b6">Technology is funky sometimes. Head over to our</span><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/3544410/3544410-6179696359273160707" target="_blank"> LinkedIn internship thread</a>&nbsp;and post your question. Someone there can help! &nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-31 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1439"><h4>BAM! I just applied, now what?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d72c-7e2a-5969-ec2efa285c69">If your application collects sufficient kudos, we&#39;ll be in touch via email to set up some phone convos, so keep an eye on your inbox and spam folder. During these calls, we&#39;ll ask about your interests, expertise, what you want to learn from us and what we can learn from you. If the calls go well, we&#39;ll invite you to Riot for a final round of interviews and to meet the team. Riot covers flights, accommodations, food, and transportation for the interviews.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-32 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1440"><h4>Can I update my application with new stuff or correct an error?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d72d-0cd9-c082-4ef68e66aa53">There will be no way to update your application once it has been submitted. You will need to resubmit a brand new application--so it is definitely worth double checking before hitting the submit button.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-33 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1495"><h4>Is there anyone I can follow up with to check my application status or reiterate my interest?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d72f-1458-0840-225893d4151b">Unfortunately, no. We promise to respond to every applicant via email by the response dates listed in the FAQ and in the job descriptions.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-34 views-row-even views-row-last">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1496"><h4>When will I get a response?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p dir="ltr">You&rsquo;ll hear back from us within two weeks.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
      <div class="view-footer">

u="nr@context",f=e("gos"),c=e(2),s={},p={},d=n.exports=o();d.backlog=s},{}],gos:[function(e,n,t){function r(e,n,t){if(o.call(e,n))return e[n];var r=t();if(Object.defineProperty&&Object.keys)try{return r(e,n,t,r){o.buffer([e],r),o.emit(e,n,t)}var o=e("ee").get("handle");n.exports=r,r.ee=o},{}],id:[function(e,n,t){function r(e){var n=typeof             		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Season One Final attracts 1.6+ million viewers</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">

<article about="/articles/20110622/144/season-one-finale-viewership" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-mmccurley odd clearfix" id="node-article-144">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Season One Final attracts 1.6+ million viewers" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>

  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/Season1-Fnatic.jpg?itok=ZFbzBFKj" width="700" height="394" alt="FnaticMSI crowned Season One Champions!" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Over 1.6 million fans tuned in to watch FnaticMSI etch their names into <em>League of Legends</em> history as the winners of the Season One Championships. Congratulations to the Season One World Champions!</p>
<p><a href="/sites/default/files/uploads/110627_NEWS_lol_seasononechampionships.pdf" target="_blank">More info here</a>.</p>

                                                    </span></a></li></ul></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/rs/rio-grande-do-sul/" class="menu-item-link state rio-grande-do-sul" title="rio grande do sul" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-rio-grande-do-sul"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-rio-grande-do-sul">
                                        rio grande do sul
                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/sc/santa-catarina/" class="menu-item-link state santa-catarina" title="santa catarina" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-santa-catarina"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-santa-catarina">
                                        santa catarina

        display: none;

    <header class="entry-header">

        <h2 class="entry-title">
            <a href="http://superela.com/2015/08/14/sua-historia-no-meu-proximo-livro/">SUA HISTÓRIA NO MEU PRÓXIMO LIVRO</a>
        </h2>
                <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="entry-category"><a href="http://superela.com/vida/" >Vida</a></span>, 
        </div>
        <span class="entry-author">

        </span>
            </header>
	    
        
</article>

					<div class="ulp-content">

			                <path d="M64,21.5l-9.3-11.4c-1.2-1.8-3.2-2.6-5.4-2.6H16.8c-2.2,0-4.3,0.8-5.4,2.7L2,22.3c-1.5,2.4-1.3,5.4,0.6,7.5l25.6,26.6 c2.6,2.8,7.1,2.8,9.6-0.1l25.6-27.2C65.3,27,65.5,23.9,64,21.5z M15.8,15.3c0.6-0.9,1.6-1.5,2.7-1.5h28.9c1.1,0,2.1,0.5,2.7,1.4 l6.9,8.1H9.3L15.8,15.3z M35.3,49.7c-1.3,1.4-3.5,1.6-4.8,0.2L10.7,29.7h44L35.3,49.7z"/>
			            </svg>
			            <span>Pro</span>

	<section id="content" role="main" class="clearfix animated">	
    	<div class="wrapper">

		            
            <header class="entry-header">
                <h1 class="entry-title page-title">
                    <span>
						                        Corpo                        
                                            </span>
                </h1>


                <h2>Dicas sobre o corpo feminino para você se sentir bem por dentro e por fora.</h2>            </header>

    <figure class="entry-image">

    </figure>
        
    <header class="entry-header">

        <h2 class="entry-title">
            <a href="http://superela.com/2016/02/11/6-razoes-para-nao-sentir-culpa-por-ter-comido-demais-no-feriado/">6 RAZÕES PARA NÃO SENTIR CULPA POR TER COMIDO DEMAIS NO FERIADO</a>

<section id="reguaJogos" class="regua-de-jogos" data-tipo-jogo="jogos_dia"><div class="glb-conteudo"><div class="glb-grid-12"><div class="conteudo-regua"><table class="lista-jogos"><tr></tr></table></div><a href="/placar-ge/hoje/" class="link-central gui-color-primary-link"><span class="mais-jogos">
                    mais jogos
                </span></a><i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-left-thin gui-color-primary off"></i><i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right-thin gui-color-primary off"></i></div></div><script id="template_jogos" type="text/x-jQuery-tmpl">
            {{if status == "Em Andamento"}}
                <td class="jogo aovivo"
                    data-time="${hora}"
                    data-transmissaoid="${transmissao_id}"
                    data-jogo_id="${id}">
            {{else status == "Encerrada"}}
                <td class="jogo encerrada {{if time_casa.penalti || time_visitante.penalti}}tem-penalti{{/if}}"
                    data-time="${hora}"
                    data-transmissaoid="${transmissao_id}"
                    data-jogo_id="${id}">
            {{else}}
                <td class="jogo"
                    data-time="${hora}"
                    data-transmissaoid="${transmissao_id}"
                    data-jogo_id="${id}">
            {{/if}}

                {{if url}}
                    <a href="${url}" data-tipojogo="${status}">
                {{else}}
                    <div class="sem-link">
                {{/if}}
                        <span class="campeonato">${nome_campeonato_normalizado}</span><p class="time-casa {{if ! time_casa.escudo}}sem-escudo{{/if}}"><strong>${time_casa.nome}</strong><small>${time_casa.sigla}</small>
                            {{if time_casa.escudo}}
                                <img src="${time_casa.escudo}" alt="${time_casa.nome}" class="escudo-time" width="30" height="30">
                            {{/if}}
                            <span class="placar-time">
                                {{if status != "Criada"}}${time_casa.placar}{{/if}}

                                {{if status == "Encerrada" && (time_visitante.penalti || time_casa.penalti)}}
                                    <span class="penalti">(${time_casa.penalti})</span>
                                {{/if}}
                            </span></p><p class="time-visitante {{if ! time_visitante.escudo}}sem-escudo{{/if}}"><strong>${time_visitante.nome}</strong><small>${time_visitante.sigla}</small>
                            {{if time_visitante.escudo}}
                                <img src="${time_visitante.escudo}" alt="${time_visitante.nome}" class="escudo-time" width="30" height="30">
                            {{/if}}
                            <span class="placar-time">
                                {{if status != "Criada"}}${time_visitante.placar}{{/if}}

                                {{if status == "Encerrada" && (time_visitante.penalti || time_casa.penalti)}}
                                    <span class="penalti">(${time_visitante.penalti})</span>
                                {{/if}}
                            </span></p><div class="tooltip-info-regua{{if url}} com-link{{else}} sem-link{{/if}}"><header>
                                ${nome_campeonato}{{if hora}} • ${hora}{{/if}}{{if localizacao}} • ${localizacao}{{/if}}
                            </header><ul class="confronto"><li class="time-casa">
                                    {{if time_casa.escudo}}
                                        <img src="${time_casa.escudo}" alt="${time_casa.nome}" class="escudo-time" width="30" height="30">
                                    {{/if}}
                                    <strong>${time_casa.nome}</strong>
                                    {{if status != "Criada"}}
                                        <span><span class="placar-time">${time_casa.placar}</span>
                                            {{if status == "Encerrada" && (time_casa.penalti || time_visitante.penalti)}} <span class="penalti">(${time_casa.penalti})</span>{{/if}}
                                        </span>
                                    {{/if}}
                                </li><li class="time-visitante">
                                    {{if time_visitante.escudo}}
                                        <img src="${time_visitante.escudo}" alt="${time_visitante.nome}" class="escudo-time" width="30" height="30">
                                    {{/if}}
                                    <strong>${time_visitante.nome}</strong>
                                    {{if status != "Criada"}}
                                        <span><span class="placar-time">${time_visitante.placar}</span>
                                            {{if status == "Encerrada" && (time_visitante.penalti || time_casa.penalti)}} <span class="penalti">(${time_visitante.penalti})</span>{{/if}}
                                        </span>
                                    {{/if}}
                                </li>
                                {{if url}}
                                <li class='footer-tooltip'><a href="${url}">
                                        {{if status == "Encerrada"}}
                                            Veja como foi
                                        {{else}}
                                            Siga em tempo real
                                        {{/if}}
                                    </a><a href="#" class="botao-fechar">x</a></li>
                                {{/if}}
                            </ul></div>
                {{if url}}
                    </a>
                {{else}}
                    </div>
                {{/if}}
            </td></script></section></div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column

$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-0ce58f69-90e4-41a1-a011-99d1d81be818',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-0ce58f69-90e4-41a1-a011-99d1d81be818').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-0ce58f69-90e4-41a1-a011-99d1d81be818'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("0ce58f69-90e4-41a1-a011-99d1d81be818");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"

    <div class="ge-card-classificacao-grupado-regua">
        <div class="gui-track-wrapper">

                <li class="gui-track-anchor ">
                    <a href="#grupo-a" class="">A</a>
                </li>
            
                <li class="gui-track-anchor ">
                    <a href="#grupo-b" class="">B</a>
                </li>
            
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    

    <div class="ge-card-classificacao-tabelas nano 2" >
        <div class="gui-track-content content">
            
            <table id="grupo-a" class="tabela-classificacao geui-table ge-card-classificacao-table">
                <thead class="ge-card-classificacao-thead">
                    <tr>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-grupo gui-track-target" colspan="4">Grupo A</td>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-pontos">P</td>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-vitorias">V</td>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-saldo">SG</td>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody class="ge-card-classificacao-tbody">
                    
                    <tr>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-position">1</td>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-escudo">
                            
                            <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/mt/futebol/times/sinop/" title="Sinop Futebol Clube" class="geui-color escudos classificacao-mato-grossense-2017 ssinop-30"></a>
                            
                        </td>
                        <td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-sigla">
                            
                            <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/mt/futebol/times/sinop/" title="Sinop Futebol Clube">

                ${equipe.sigla}
            {{if link}}
                </a>
            {{/if}}
        </td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-variacao"><div class="ge-card-classificacao-variacao"><span>${variacao}</span><span class="sprite-variacao sprite-${variacao_label}"></span></div></td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-pontos">${ pontos }</td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-vitorias">${ vitorias }</td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-saldo">${ saldo_gols }</td></tr></script><script>
$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-f74bb49a-4379-48ae-9bf8-67028d15bc4e',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-f74bb49a-4379-48ae-9bf8-67028d15bc4e').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-f74bb49a-4379-48ae-9bf8-67028d15bc4e'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("f74bb49a-4379-48ae-9bf8-67028d15bc4e");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/mt/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"

    <article class="mod-post" data-pid="25668">
        <a href="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/5-formas-de-usar-pasta-de-dente-para-cuidar-da-beleza/" class="post-link" title="5 formas de usar pasta de dente para cuidar da beleza">
                            <img src="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/site/wp-content/themes/financas-femininas/images/lazy/post-280x230.png" class="b-lazy" data-src="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/site/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/pasta-de-dente-beleza-01-280x230.jpg" alt="5 formas de usar pasta de dente para cuidar da beleza">
                    </a>

        <div class="content right relative">
        
            <p class="date">25.03.2017</p>
            <h1 class="l-title l-title-m">
                <a href="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/5-formas-de-usar-pasta-de-dente-para-cuidar-da-beleza/" class="post-link" title="5 formas de usar pasta de dente para cuidar da beleza">
                    5 formas de usar pasta de dente para cuidar da beleza                </a>
            </h1>
            <p class="cat"><a href='http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/economize/beleza/' class=''>Beleza</a></p>
            <p>
                <a href="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/5-formas-de-usar-pasta-de-dente-para-cuidar-da-beleza/" class="post-link" title="Pasta de dente para unhas brilhando? Esse é apenas um dos seus usos inusitados. Maytê Carvalho, do Beleza de Farmácia, ensina os demais para você ficar linda sem gastar dinheiro.">
                    Pasta de dente para unhas brilhando? Esse é apenas um dos seus usos inusitados. Maytê Carvalho, do Beleza de Farmácia, ensina os demais para você ficar linda sem gastar dinheiro.                </a>
            </p>

                            <article class="mod-post">
        <a href="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/como-mobiliar-um-apartamento-com-r-1800/" class="post-link" title="Como mobiliar um apartamento com R$ 1800">
                            <img src="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/site/wp-content/themes/financas-femininas/images/lazy/post-280x230.png" class="b-lazy" data-src="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/site/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/shutterstock_291774464-min-280x230.jpg" alt="Como mobiliar um apartamento com R$ 1800">
                    </a>

        <div class="content right relative">

                <p class="date">21.03.2017</p>

    <article class="mod-post">
        <a href="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/5-motivos-para-nao-viajar-na-lua-de-mel/" class="post-link" title="5 motivos para não viajar na lua-de-mel">
                            <img src="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/site/wp-content/themes/financas-femininas/images/lazy/post-280x230.png" class="b-lazy" data-src="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/site/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/nao-viajar-lua-de-mel-01-280x230.jpg" alt="5 motivos para não viajar na lua-de-mel">
                    </a>

        <div class="content right relative">
            <a href="http://financasfemininas.uol.com.br/5-motivos-para-nao-viajar-na-lua-de-mel/" class="post-link" title="5 motivos para não viajar na lua-de-mel">

                <p>Quem disse que vocês precisam viajar na lua-de-mel? A falta de grana é apenas um dos motivos para deixar a viagem para depois. A equipe do Casar é um Barato revela outros.</p>

<section id="single-errors" class="modal fm-modal">
		<article class="modal-content">

			<h1 class="l-title l-title-m">Comunicar erros</h1>

			<div class="form-wrapper">
				<form class="form-single-errors" id="form-single-errors" method="post" accept-charset="utf-8">

					<p><small>Para comunicar erros nos textos publicados por Finanças Femininas, preencha os dados abaixo e clique em Enviar. Campos marcados com asteriscos são obrigatórios.</small></p>

					<h2 class="m-title m-title-m hr">Informações</h2>

					<div class="relative">
						<div class="input-field">
							<select name="motivo">
								<option value="" disabled selected>Motivo</option>

							</select>
						</div>
					</div>

							<input type="text" name="nome" minlength="3" />

						</div>
					</div>

					<div class="relative">

							<input type="email" name="email" />
							<label for="email" class="unselectable no-events">Email<small>*</small></label>
						</div>
					</div>

						<div class="input-field col s12">
							<textarea id="textarea1" class="materialize-textarea" name="comentarios"></textarea>
							<label for="textarea1">Comentários<small>*</small></label>
						</div>
					</div>

		<h2 class="title-1300"><a href="http://gizmodo.uol.com.br/sistema-energia-10-mil-sois/"  title="Cientistas criam sistema com energia de 10 mil sóis &#8211; e por um ótimo motivo">Cientistas criam sistema com energia de 10 mil sóis &#8211; e por um ótimo motivo</a></h2>
		<div class="chamada-thumb">
			<div class="chamada-cat">	<a href="http://gizmodo.uol.com.br/fisica/" >física</a><br />
</div>			<a class="chamada-thumb-img" href="http://gizmodo.uol.com.br/sistema-energia-10-mil-sois/"  title="Cientistas criam sistema com energia de 10 mil sóis &#8211; e por um ótimo motivo" class="destaque-thumb">

				<img width="540" height="305" src="http://gizmodo.uol.com.br/wp-content/blogs.dir/8/files/2017/03/10-mil-sois-540x305.jpg" class="attachment-540x338 wp-post-image" alt="10-mil-sois" attachment_more_title="" attachment_more_url="" attachment_more_contador_clique="" />			</a>
		</div>
				<div class="chamada-contents">
			<div class="chamada-intro">
				<a href="http://gizmodo.uol.com.br/sistema-energia-10-mil-sois/"  title="Cientistas criam sistema com energia de 10 mil sóis &#8211; e por um ótimo motivo">
					Cientistas alemães construíram um novo sistema de luz poderoso que consegue focar energia equivalente à radiação de dez mil sóis em um único ponto. [...]				</a>
											<div class="autor">
																					<p class="por">Por: <a href="http://gizmodo.uol.com.br/author/george-dvorsky/" title="Posts de George Dvorsky" rel="author">George Dvorsky</a></p>
																				 às 12:03						</div>
					
			</div>

		<path fill="#FFFFFF" d="M344.197,10.218c-0.735-4.252-4.377-6.815-8.727-6.83c-4.6-0.016-7.857,2.173-7.869,5.674
			c-0.013,3.85,4.832,5.066,9.478,6.482c4.896,1.467,11.538,3.689,11.516,10.49c-0.021,5.899-5.135,10.183-12.836,10.157
